message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.
I'm interested in the product, but $900000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $750000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make sure I get a good price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $850000 to feel comfortable selling it to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $850000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $800000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
